QuestData.Title: The Blade Itself
QuestData.Description: When they clapped me in irons, the Burning Blade instructor, Luhk the Keen-Eyed, took my blade. He's an honorable orc, even if his training techniques are counter-productive.$B$BI want my blade back, $c. Then, I'll break myself free.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This trainer of blademasters has Lantresor's Blade.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve Lantresor's Blade from Instructor Luhk.
QuestData.RewardText: If you can defeat Luhk, then perhaps there's some hope for you after all.
